title: Plat team looking for ADC + Support.
body:
Plat team looking for bot lane. need to be able to play weekends. semi serious.


Add: PredatorZ

replies.body: Hello!, i am carrently rank 4 in brenze 3. I like to main river, espexially drag pit. I would like to try out for this teem, wen do u host trail night?

IGN: Skillz that kill

I could be interested, I am an adc main I have a partner that can play support both are Platinum, highest rank plat 1. What rank are we trying to achieve with this team and will there be practice games? cheers.

In solo q i am also a 1 trick pony riven, if a top laner is needed

Plat 5 supp main. Can play all supports although i rarely play alistar, lulu and taric since season 3/4.

Was plat 3 with diamond elo in solo q season 4.

Rank: Currently Plat 5.. just got demoted due to a bad streak of angry people.. usually around plat 1 - 3.

Roles: Top and ADC main

Age: 21 years old

Mic: Have a mic and use curse, TS and Skype

IGN : NightFight

Hello. Whoever is interested in joining,

1. You need to be in plat or higher 
2. You need to have a headset + Mic
3. You need Teamspeak
Right now there is too many people trying to join as a adc and sup. Im looking a Top main. 

Thankyou
Support role. Currently unranked doing provisionals. Work on Saturdays can play after 5:30pm, Sundays and Wednesdays. Just wondering what internet cafe your team meets at if there is one? :)

did i make it in my 5 second trial?

=D
